channel.title: About the Rebmu category
channel.description:
Rebmu is a dialect for solving [Code Golf challenges](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_golf), where the goal is to express the source code for solving a puzzle in the fewest characters of source code possible. See the README here:
https://github.com/hostilefork/rebmu
Significant design points in Ren-C were inspired by wanting to make the implementation and bending of Rebmu more effective.
While the project is a serious effort in several ways, a lighthearted presentation was given at the Rebol Montreal Conference in 2013.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iDKaz1iB9wQ

Significant design points in Ren-C were inspired by wanting to make the implementation and bending of Rebmu more effective.

While the project is a serious effort in several ways, a lighthearted presentation was given at the Rebol Montreal Conference in 2013.
